parameters: Press \BK[2]\PK[1] to invert the image, press \BK[6]\PK[2] to exit.
A strange shadow appears behind the mosquito netting.
There is a bottle and an empty bowl on the bed.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]If you wish to find the answer, You must give up something precious...
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Does it mean that one needs to give up \c[1]something he values \c[0]before asking questions?
On the body of the vase, it reads \c[1]'If you wish to find the answer, You must give up something precious.'\c[0]
On the body of the vase, it reads \c[1]'If you wish to find the answer, You must give up something precious.'\c[0]
Put the marble and the feather into the bowl
Put the marble and the feather into the bowl
A female voice is coming from the vase.
\c[3]Vase Girl \c[0]What do you want to know?
\c[3]Vase Girl \c[0]You're using other people's valuable possessions, so I can only answer questions about them.
\c[3]Vase Girl \c[0]Who do you want to hear about?
\c[3]Vase Girl \c[0]After the father died, the grandfather beat up the doctor who treated his son.
\c[3]Vase Girl \c[0]The mother secretly visited the doctor.
\c[3]Vase Girl \c[0]She said the doctor was a good person who did nothing wrong.
\c[3]Vase Girl \c[0]After the father died, the grandfather beat up the doctor who treated his son.
\c[3]Vase Girl \c[0]She said the doctor was a good person who did nothing wrong.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]...So, Zhao Xiaojuan had an affair with Ye Jingshan?
\c[3]Vase Girl \c[0]I can answer each person one question only.
\c[3]Vase Girl \c[0]Ms. Chen is different from other teachers.
\c[3]Vase Girl \c[0]She's like a big sister, and is very gentle to us.
\c[3]Vase Girl \c[0]I asked her why she came here to teach, she always answered...
\c[3]Vase Girl \c[0]Ms. Chen is different from other teachers.
\c[3]Vase Girl \c[0]She's like a big sister, and is very gentle to us.
\c[3]Vase Girl \c[0]I asked her why she came here to teach, she always answered...
Press \BK[2]\PK[1] to invert the image, press \BK[6]\PK[2] to exit.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Ms. Chen...Where did you go just now?
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]I was about to ask you the same thing, I just turned around and you disappeared.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]I saw you staring at Fangfang's certificate blankly as I came in.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]By the way, I discovered that the door at \c[1]the entrance\c[0] was open.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]There's a dark staircase leading down.
You can obtain more clues by investigating some places again.
A damaged page of a diary is stuck on the wall.
Today, Grandpa went to see the old lady with us.
Grandma said I couldn't enter the house and told me to go play outside.
I saw a small shed on the road with 'Vase Girl' written on it.
I was curious, so I bought a ticket.
Press \BK[2]\PK[1] to tear off the ticket.
Blood smeared the window. There are black feathers on it.
There is a crack on the certificate, something seems to be hidden behind it.
Use the \c[1]arrow keys\c[0] to tear open the crack.\WAIT[80]\^
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]This is the certificate Fangfang won in the city's writing contest.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]She was really smart and imaginative.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]If she hadn't passed away, she probably would have more opportunities...
A small bed piled with stuff, it looks like it's been a long time since someone slept on it.
A small bed piled with stuff, it looks like it's been a long time since someone slept on it.
\c[1]Lin Lixun \c[0]It seems to be Fangfang's bed, why is it piled up with stuff?
\c[1]Chen Qingsui \c[0]I don't know, I remember hearing Fangfang say...
\c[1]Chen Qingsui \c[0]her grandmother didn't let her sleep in the same room with her mom
\c[1]Chen Qingsui \c[0]She slept in her grandma's room since then.
A small bed piled with stuff, it looks like it's been a long time since someone slept on it.
